str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Of Chaldee origin; date-house; Beth-any, a place in Palestine.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
From oikos; properly, residence, but usually an abode; by implication, a family.
Simon. Of Hebrew origin; Simon, the name of nine Israelites.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A leprous person, a leper. From the same as lepra; scaly, i.e. Leprous.
